attributes.action: Ban smoking sales during the COVID-19 pandemic - vaping only. Protect the NHS.
attributes.additional_details:
“It is abundantly clear from the research into previous coronaviruses that smoking makes the impact of a coronavirus worse.” - Matt Hancock
Smokers have treble the risk of dying or needing hospitalization from COVID-19.
https://blogs.bmj.com/bmj/2020/03/20/covid-19-the-role-of-smoking-cessation-during-respiratory-virus-epidemics/
World Health Organization:
http://www.emro.who.int/tfi/know-the-truth/tobacco-and-waterpipe-users-are-at-increased-risk-of-covid-19-infection.html

PROTECT THE NHS
attributes.background:
Ban sales of tobacco, cigars, cigarettes, water pipes etc & only allow vaping liquid to be sold during the pandemic. Add smoking information to the NHS COVID-19 website. Consider making nicotine patches free. Promote #quitforcovid19 
Smoking is an extra burden on the NHS

SMOKING WORSENS COVID-19

rejection.details:
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/310248

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here: 

www.gov.uk/coronavirus 

https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/ 

The Government has also created an online service to help you out what you can do if you’re struggling because of coronavirus: https://www.gov.uk/find-coronavirus-support 

You can read NHS tips to help if you are worried about coronavirus here: https://www.nhs.uk/oneyou/every-mind-matters/coronavirus-covid-19-anxiety-tips
